attributes.action: Ban the export of waste plastic and require that all is recycled in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Currently about 66% of the plastic for recycling is being exported and in most cases either dumped to a form of landfill or burnt in an uncontrolled manner causing toxic emissions.
attributes.background: Introduce legislation requiring all plastic collected or separated for recycling to be recycled in the United Kingdom and prohibit the export of plastic waste

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586467
